venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
RiffTrax Live is presenting in conjunction with Fathom Events, Plan 9 From Outer Space. These events are great fun for B movie fans, or fans of Mystery Science Theater 3000 commentary. The show starts @ 7:30pm, but it's always a good idea to get there early for snacks.

I went to the RiffTrax showing of Birdemic in October and there were plenty of people there. So be warned: we won't wait until the last moment to find our seats. Get there by 7:00 if you want good seats.

If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Plan 9 From Outer Space - MST3K Style
